name: Learned Optimism: How to Change Your Mind and Your Life

reviews.name: Learned Optimism: How to Change Your Mind and Your Life
reviews.reviewText: as a person who tends to see the glass as half empty, I've been trying to improve my outlook, and this book is very helpful in training your brain to see the bright side of life. Recommended if you're motivated to give it a try!
reviews.title: great book

reviews.name: Learned Optimism: How to Change Your Mind and Your Life
reviews.reviewText: Loved the book and learned a lot from it. Helped me to change my thoughts a bit. Since then I've got to say (haven't been doing this more than a couple of weeks) that I feel a lot better. What the author says makes a tremendous amount of sense. Definitely worth the time and money in my opinion.
reviews.title: Awesome book....

reviews.name: Learned Optimism: How to Change Your Mind and Your Life
reviews.reviewText: Will change the way you think and see the past, present and future. There are three great things that you can take and apply in your daily life. After I finished it I gave it to my sister in law to read.
reviews.title: Eye Openning
